EmailTemplate.subject: REGISTER TODAY: Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference, Asia Pacific
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference, Asia Pacific
Dear Customer, We are pleased to invite you to Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conferences in Asia! The two-day conferences will be held in both Malaysia and China in October.
During each conference, our experts will present on the following topics:
- Technical and Reliability Updates - Honeywell Technology Updates and Connected Maintenance Strategies - Honeywell's Connected Solution - And more!
Please see the full agenda <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201810_HOC_APAC.html]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201810_HOC_APAC.html]]>for more details.
Date Location
October 16-17
Malaysia JW Marriott Hotel Kuala Lumpur 183 Jalan Bukit Bintang Kuala Lumpur 55100 MalaysiaReserve your room. <[[https://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%20Operator%20Conferences%5Ekuldt%60honhona%60460%60MYR%60false%602%6010/12/18%6010/20/18%6010/7/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>
October 23-24
China Renaissance Haikou Hotel No 39 Yangshan Boulevard, Longhua District Haikou Hainan 571155 China Reserve your room. <[[https://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%20group%20%5EHAKMH%60A96A96A%7CA96A96B%60471.70%60CNY%60false%602%6010/17/18%6010/29/18%6010/12/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>
The limited seats are available. Please secure your spot today!
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201810_HOC_APAC.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you! Andrew Kirk Vice President, Customer & Product Support, Asia Pacific Honeywell International Inc.
